item.title: Tesla Aims to Bring Robotaxi to California, Arizona
item.description: Tesla Inc. is aiming to bring its driverless taxis to California and Arizona as the carmaker plots an expansion on the heels of last month’s limited rollout in Austin. CEO Elon Musk has been under pre
